groups.label: Have you ever worked in a hot environment previously?
Have you ever had any previous adverse reaction to working in a very hot environment?
Have you ever had a heat-related illness (Heat stroke, Heat Exhaustion)?
Have you ever experienced loss of consciousness, fits or faints?
Do you have diabetes, thyroid problems or any other hormonal conditions?
Have you ever had high blood pressure, a heart or any other vascular disease
Have you ever had shortness of breath, asthma or lung problems?
Are you prone to any skin conditions, including dermatitis or infection?
Have you ever had treatment that reduces your capacity to sweat e.g. sympathectomy?
Are you taking any prescribed or over-the counter medication?
Have you ever suffered from renal colic, kidney or bladder stones

Statement

I authorise the examining medical practitioner to provide the results of my medical examination to the employer. I also consent to allow my general practitioner/other treating doctor to release details of relevant medical conditions to the Redimed Medical centre. 

I have read the above statements. The answers are correct, and no information concerning my present or past health has been withheld.
